To understand the concept of diet better, foods can be divided into the following 
groups:
✱  Cereals and potatoes (carbohydrates)
✱  Fruits and vegetables (vitamins and minerals)
✱  Milk and dairy foods (proteins and calcium)
✱  Meat, fish, pulses/legumes (protein)
✱  Oils (fats)
